@ sinner77

Ami hisab kare dekhlam amar collection e 1000+ bengali films ache jar madhye 400+ 3rd class movie o ache - jamon - baba kano chakor, sujon sakhi, sajani go sajani, pabitra papi, beder meye jyosna - je gulo up karbar kono echha amar nei ! baki 600 er madhye besh kichu already up kare diyechi + kichu classic ache jar print khub kharap + kichu movie ache ( Dhuli - Suchitra sen ) jegulo te leechers pawa jabe na !

Baki railo 400+ movies ! eder madhye bhalo classic gulo age up kare debo thik karechi ! tarpar baki good film gulo dhire dhire up karbo ! bangla te adult movie ar 10 - 12 ta mato hay ! se gulo majh khane gunje debo + New movie release ! ta hale motamuti bangla section ta complete habe ! tomar ki matamot seta janio ! tomar answer er janyo wait karchi ! bhalo theko !

Dear Robin
